profile:
Vail Renovations and Handyman Services was created in 2008. Servicing home owners and businesses in Ottawa and surrounding area. With 20 years in the industry it has come to our attention that there is a need for dependable handyman services throughout Ottawa and we would be glad to offer our services to you and your clients. Vail Renovations and handyman Services is capable of servicing all of your needs from inside renovations such as painting, framing, drywall, fixtures, plumbing (subcontracted to licensed
trades-persons when required) and repairs to outside landscaping, general clean up, fencing and property maintenance. As well as having many years in the moving industry we are able to offer moving consultations as well.

 

As you know, many people do not have the time for the smaller jobs that are needed when buying or selling a home and this is where Vail Renovations and Handyman Services can help you.

 

For more information on what Vail Renovations and Handyman Services can do for you please feel free to contact us and feel free to browse our website for a complete portfolio and testimonials

 

Vail Renovations and Handyman Services now serves such companies as The Brick, Groupe CDP, Atlas Van lines, AMJ Campbell Van lines, Fred Guy Van lines, Best Buy and Future Shop, Black Lab Inn, Capital Home Staging and Design, Various realtors with  in the city of Ottawa, Capital Home Staging and Design, as well as many private home owners.

We look forward to meeting with you to discuss how Vail Renovations and Handyman Services can help you too.




Please email direct at setitup@rogers.com 
Servicing Ottawa with handyman services since 2008. renovations,decks,doors,repairs,gutters, basements,kitchens,bathrooms,custom showers,tile,laminate,hardwood,painting, drywall,contractor,flood damaged homes,landscaping,baseboard,trim,crown molding,plumbing (subcontracted to licensed trades-persons) electricians (work performed by ECCRA certified master electricians),fixtures,appliance/electronic hook-ups,interior or exterior.

profile:
You may don't have the time, the tool, the skills or other reasons to get things done around your house. 4hirehandyman is for you to help and make things happened. Check out the services that we offer. If you don't find your project on the list just call us or send a message we will do our best!

INSTALLATION
– Painting
– Hang anything (picture, curtain, blinds, etc.)
– Doors, doorknobs, windows, etc. 
– Trim and moulding
– Dryer, washer, dishwasher installation
– Shelves
– Closet organizing
– Gazebo assembly
– GYM and other equipment assembly
– IKEA & another furniture assembly
– Pick up and delivery from IKEA
– and more

REPAIR
– Painting
– Deck, porch
– Grout repair
– Caulking, silicone sealing
– Shower sealing
– Mosquito screen

– and more

PC MAINTENANCE
– Clean up PC
– Set up a new computer
– Install software
– Upgrade software, hardware

_“All electrical work is subcontracted out to ECRA/ESA Licensed Electrical Contractor, 
______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Ceiling repairs,  Drop Ceilings , Ceramic tile removal and installation , Floor tile mortar repairs,  installation of Laminate flooring , Wall Papering  .  Pocket Door adjustments , Blinds  and Curtains rods.
_______________________________________________________________________
Power Washing Decks, Driveways ,Walkways  and Houses, Parging repairs
Resealing Interlock walks or decks, repairing interlock steps, regluing steps , repair retaining walls. 
releveling interlock patios, small walkway installs. 
Interlock stone patio cleaning- mold between stones , weeds and grass removal and resealing joints. 
Fencing, wood fence panels,  Chain link fencing , Hand Rails , Steps,  Deck repairs, Deck shades, Deck covers, Awnings, Interlock stone repairs.  Pool sheds , Shade covers,

Tree cutting , Ash Tree Removal, Hedge Trimming. Cedar Hedge installs
Topsoil Moving, Fill Moving, Debris Moving,  Compact Tractor Rental with Operator.

I DO NOT WORK BY THE HOUR, fixed price jobs only and email quotes are free.   To assist you with budgeting , I have a minimum charge of $175.00 per project. profile:
Reliable home repair solutions. Quality workmanship, guaranteed.
 
Do you need a hand with your property? The Golden Years Team Can help with your repairs and renovations as well as your regular property maintenance projects. Our team offers most building and renovation services under one roof by trusted pro's. Our reliable team of professionals get your to do list done right. Let us know what you need and we will help you with the best handyman for the job. Your scope of work can range from drywall repairs to deck boards replacement, caulking or cracked tile replacement, we can help you with a wide range of projects. From full kitchen renovations or bathroom renovations to a basement remodel to a scratch on your hardwood we can advise on the best solutions and go over your options for home repair solutions. 
 
We are located across Ottawa for your assistance; Downtown Ottawa, Alta Vista, Hunt Club, Gloucester, Findlay Creek, Nepean, Barrhaven, Bayshore, Kanata, Stittsville, Manotick, Orleans and beyond.
 
Quality workmanship, guaranteed on your project. 
 
For your convenience, we can quote on any size of home improvement and renovation projects. Give us a call for eaves cleaning, leaks or odd jobs, full service painting, drywall, flooring, tiling, installation, decks, fencing, concrete work, basement, kitchen or bathroom renovations. We do all sorts jobs; repairs, maintenance or installations. 
 
Locally Owned and Operated, Screened, Bonded and Experienced. 
Registered Service Provider with Veterans Affairs Canada. 
 
You can contact us to schedule an appointment or for a free quote. 
 
•	brick, masonry, concrete 
•	carpentry, crown moulding, trimwork 
•	fence, deck, railing, siding 
•	flooring, tiling
•	interlock, paving, driveways 
•	lawn care & tree maintenance 
•	painting 
•	general renovations

profile:
For 15 years, Gillespie Handyman Services has been serving commercial and residential customers in Ottawa and throughout the National Capital Region. We are a unique company in the market as our experience cuts across disciplines – we’ve done it all, and we’re ready to bring that knowledge and experience to your next job!

What Sets Us Apart:

We pride ourselves on several core principles that we bring to work with us each and every day:

We deliver premium service – both in the quality of our work, and our commitment to high-quality customer service.

We work with you every step of the way to deliver a solution that truly solves your needs – whether it’s a quick fix that just requires some know-how, or a larger project that you need completed on-time and on-budget.

We come into your home or commercial location on your terms. We show up on time, we conduct ourselves professionally, and we meet your expectations without exception.

profile:
We started out small with just a few customers. But we have built a business on taking pride in the work we do for other people's homes. 
 
Now we operate all over the Ottawa area. 
 
Why can we quote over the phone? When a contractor drives to your house to give you a quote, he's building into that quote the fact that he spent half a day driving out to your house. He's also adding more on top just in case something goes wrong and his men have to stay longer to finish the job.
 
We don't like that. We've been doing this for years. We are the professionals. We know how long things take without having to see it in person. It's simple. We've done it a hundreds of times before.
name: Tim The Handyman
